article_title: Feds Slam Mt. Sinai’s Bid To Dodge Medicaid Repayment Row
article_text:
Feds Slam Mt. Sinai’s Bid To Dodge Medicaid Repayment Row

Law360, New York (November 13, 2014, 5:45 PM ET) -- The federal government and the state of New York have asked a federal judge to keep a False Claims Act suit against the Mount Sinai Health System alive, saying a provision of the Affordable Care Act forces hospitals to repay bogus Medicaid charges within 60 days.
